mozilla.components.support.base.log.logger

Class Logger

  • mozilla.components.support.base.log.logger.Logger

  • public class Logger

    A wrapper for the Log object providing a more convenient API for logging.

      • measure

        public void measure(java.lang.String message,
                    kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> block)

        Measure the time it takes to execute the provided block and print a log message before and after executing the block.

        Example log message: ⇢ doSomething() .. ⇠ doSomething() 12ms

        See Also:
        .., 12ms
